medium: Found and prepared wood on plywood base
signed: on back ULC in black ink: SIGNED ON / BACK & FRONT / GEORGE MORRISON / GRAND PORTAGE / 1992
text: A horizontal format composition made with hundreds of individual pieces of wood laid down as interlocking pieces and arranged so that they are flat. The pieces of wood vary in size, shape, and length. Some appear pale, bleached by the sun, others are amber and dark brown, a range of shades that gives the piece a dynamic variety of tones. Some of the wood has traces of green and blue paint.
title: Untitled
